markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Lumber Consortium Laborer](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=120)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Shining Kingdoms

</column>

You have suffered as a worker for the unscrupulous Lumber Consortium, laboring under harsh conditions in dangerous wooded regions of Andoran.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Dexterity, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill, and the [Forest Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Assurance](/Feats.aspx?ID=756) skill feat with [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3).
name: Lumber Consortium Laborer
